entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 5:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: N 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
